name: ubee
description: Layered AOP forgery tools : up/bottom methods, collider and restrictions

scripts.dist: npm run build  && npm run min && gzip -c -9 dist/ubee.min.js > dist/ubee.min.js.gz
scripts.dist:full: npm run build:full  && npm run min:full && gzip -c -9 dist/ubee.full.min.js > dist/ubee.full.min.js.gz
scripts.bump:patch: npm run dist && npm run dist:full && git add -A && git commit -m 'patch bump' && git push && mversion patch -m && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.bump:minor: npm run dist && npm run dist:full && git add -A && git commit -m 'minor bump' && git push && mversion minor -m && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.bump:major: npm run dist && npm run dist:full && git add -A && git commit -m 'major bump' && git push && mversion major -m && git push --tags && npm publish && git push

author: Gilles Coomans <gilles.coomans@gmail.com>
